dialogue.text: I feel like the only reason why you are forcing us to rap battle is because of your own benefit.
The benefit of being better than the others, the feeling that you will never have in your sad pathetic life.
Sheâ€™s probably fucking another dude right now, you will never live up to her expectations.
The only reason why you are rap battling is to not feel hollow within yourself, which even then is not helping with anything, is it?
You live day in and day out being sought out by your girlfriends parents and almost being murdered by them, you live a sad life and it will never get better.
You are not a good person and never will be, rap battling others for your own personal benefit to fix your petty little life, fuck you.
